metadata.title: CVE-2018-4022 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the way MKVToolNix MKVINFO v25.0.0handles the MKV (matroska) file format. A specially crafted MKV file cancause arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user.

criterions.comment: mkvtoolnix package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
